text: Capitellum is a genus of skinks. Species were previously placed in the genus Mabuya. ==Species== The following 3 species, listed alphabetically by specific name, are recognized as being valid: *Capitellum mariagalantae Hedges & Conn, 2012 – Marie-Galante skink *Capitellum metallicum (Bocourt, 1879) – lesser Martinique skink *Capitellum parvicruzae Hedges & Conn, 2012 – lesser Saint Croix skink Nota bene: A binomial authority in parentheses indicates that the species was originally described in a genus other than Capitellum. ==References== Category:Capitellum Category:Lizard genera Category:Taxa named by Stephen Blair Hedges Category:Taxa named by Caitlin E. Conn
title: Capitellum (skink)
